mapper.select: select MEM_NAME, MEM_NICK, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_PHONE, MEM_ADDR1, MEM_ADDR2 from MEMBER where MEM_ID =#{MEM_ID}
mapper.update: update MEMBER set MEM_NAME = #{MEM_NAME}, MEM_PWD = #{MEM_PWD}, MEM_NICK = #{MEM_NICK}, MEM_PHONE = #{MEM_PHONE}, MEM_ADDR1 = #{MEM_ADDR1}, MEM_ADDR2 = #{MEM_ADDR2} where MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum as RNUM, s.* FROM (SELECT o.OR_UNQ, o.OR_NUM, i.ITEM_NAME, i.ITEM_NUM, i.ITEM_IMAGE1, to_char(o.OR_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') OR_DATE, o.OR_CNT, o.OR_FP, o.OR_OP, d.DEL_DATE, d.DEL_DS FROM ITEM i, ORDERS o, MEMBER m, DELIVERY d WHERE m.MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID} AND m.MEM_NUM = o.MEM_NUM AND o.ITEM_NUM = i.ITEM_NUM AND o.OR_UNQ = d.OR_UNQ AND d.DEL_NUM in (SELECT max(DEL_NUM) FROM delivery group by OR_UNQ) order by OR_UNQ desc)s) WHERE RNUM >= #{START_NUM} AND RNUM <= #{END_NUM}
SELECT COUNT(*)as TOTAL FROM ORDERS WHERE MEM_NUM = #{MEM_NUM}

SELECT d.OR_UNQ, d.OR_NUM, i.ITEM_NAME, to_char(d.DEL_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') DEL_DATE, d.DEL_DS FROM DELIVERY d, ITEM i, ORDERS o WHERE d.OR_UNQ = #{OR_UNQ} AND d.OR_UNQ = o.OR_UNQ AND o.ITEM_NUM = i.ITEM_NUM ORDER BY DEL_NUM DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum as RNUM, s.* FROM( SELECT j.JJIM_NUM, i.ITEM_IMAGE1, i.ITEM_NAME, i.ITEM_PRICE, i.ITEM_NUM FROM JJIM j, ITEM i, MEMBER m WHERE m.MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID} AND m.MEM_NUM = j.MEM_NUM AND i.ITEM_NUM = j.ITEM_NUM order by JJIM_NUM desc)s) WHERE RNUM >= #{START_NUM} AND RNUM <= #{END_NUM}
SELECT COUNT(*)as TOTAL FROM JJIM j, MEMBER m WHERE m.MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID} AND j.MEM_NUM = m.MEM_NUM

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum as RNUM, s.* FROM( SELECT to_char(q.QNA_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') QNA_DATE, q.QNA_NUM, q.QNA_CATE, i.ITEM_NAME, q.QNA_TITLE, DECODE( q.QNA_RSTATE, 'N','처리중','Y','답변완료') QNA_RSTATE FROM ITEM i, QNA q, MEMBER m WHERE m.MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID} AND m.MEM_ID = q.MEM_ID AND i.ITEM_NUM = q.ITEM_NUM order by QNA_DATE desc)s) WHERE RNUM >= #{START_NUM} AND RNUM <= #{END_NUM}
SELECT COUNT(*)as TOTAL FROM QNA WHERE MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID}

SELECT q.QNA_NUM, q.QNA_TITLE, q.QNA_CONTENT, to_char(q.QNA_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') QNA_DATE, i.ITEM_NAME, q.QNA_RSTATE, q.QNA_RCONTENT FROM QNA q, ITEM i WHERE q.QNA_NUM = #{QNA_NUM} AND i.ITEM_NUM = q.ITEM_NUM

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum as RNUM, s.* FROM( SELECT r.RE_NUM, i.ITEM_NAME, r.RE_TITLE, TO_CHAR(r.RE_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') RE_DATE, r.RE_LIKE, r.RE_HIT FROM MEMBER m, ITEM i, REVIEW r WHERE m.MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID} AND m.MEM_NUM = r.MEM_NUM AND i.ITEM_NUM = r.ITEM_NUM AND r.DEL_GB='N' order by RE_DATE desc)s) WHERE RNUM >= #{START_NUM} AND RNUM <= #{END_NUM}
SELECT COUNT(*)as TOTAL FROM REVIEW r, MEMBER m WHERE m.MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID} AND m.MEM_NUM = r.MEM_NUM

SELECT r.RE_NUM, i.ITEM_NAME, r.RE_TITLE, r.RE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(r.RE_DATE,'YYYY.MM.DD') RE_DATE, r.RE_HIT, r.RE_LIKE FROM REVIEW r, MEMBER m, ITEM i WHERE r.RE_NUM = #{RE_NUM} AND m.MEM_ID = #{MEM_ID} AND m.MEM_NUM = r.MEM_NUM AND r.ITEM_NUM = i.ITEM_NUM
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET RE_HIT = NVL(RE_HIT, 0)+1 WHERE RE_NUM = #{RE_NUM}
mapper.delete: UPDATE REVIEW SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE RE_NUM = #{RE_NUM}
